name: Animate - Drip
description:
This is a traditional animation of 12 keyframes manually created and positioned.


The final GIF was created by exporting all 12 images and using an online tool to convert them to a looping animation.


There might be a Plug-In that can do this.


The delay between frames was set to 1000ms / 12 = 83 roughly.


- Reichart
